venue.address_2: For directions, see the "Details" section of this meetup
venue.name: MIT

item.description:
Directions:
Enter MIT building on main entrance on 77 Mass ave and walk down the long corridor until you see a sign for building 4 - at which point you take the right corridor and walk down all the way. At the end take a left. Walk down and you will find a lobby with a staircase - take right corridor at this point and you will find 2-131 in this corridor.
item.name: Breathing and Meditation for Peace of Mind
